dct_title_s: Asher & Adams' world on Mercator's projection
dct_description_sm: "Entered according to Act of Congress in the year 1874 by Asher & Adams, in the Office of the Librarian of Congress at Washington." Relief shown by hachures. Shows shipping routes, ocean currents, etc. Prime meridians: Greenwich and Washington.
